AI Description: ParMETIS is an MPI-based parallel graph partitioning and sparse matrix ordering library designed for efficiently solving large, sparse graph problems. It provides high-performance graph partitioning, matrix reordering, and fill-reducing matrix ordering capabilities for a wide range of scientific computing applications.
Core Features: Mpi-Based Parallel Graph Partitioning, Sparse Matrix Reordering, High-Performance Capabilities, Optimized For Large, Sparse Graph Problems
General Tags: Graph Partitioning, Sparse Matrix Ordering, Scientific Computing, Parallel Computing
